p: Chromatographic peak 1 (0.52 min) ( Figure 2A) showed a precursor ion [M − H] − at m/ z 191.0554 with the predicted molecular formula C 7H 11O 6 (mass error 0.4 ppm), suggesting the presence of quinic acid. The MS2 spectrum ( Figure S2a) indicated a base peak at m/ z 111.0076, associated with the successive loss of two water molecules and a -CO 2 group from quinic acid.
